roleset.name: remove knots, lumps, loose threads from fabric
roleset.note: BURL-V NOTES: Automatically created based on 'milk'. Updated by Julia, 2/2012 (from burl.01-v)

example.name: Usual use
example.text: John burls a small lock of wool from the garment.

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: She-1 was often engaged in her own house [*-1] burling cloth for the manufacturers, by which means she earned a scanty addition to their income.
example.arg: by which means she earned a scanty addition to their income
